top_visible_issues: No blog or dynamic content section limiting ongoing SEO visibility
Testimonials manually displayed rather than dynamically embedded from Google
Mobile performance score of 65 indicates moderate performance with room for improvement
outreach_hook: Arnos Bistrot has built a strong local reputation with a 4.9 Google rating across 293 reviews, and the website has a solid foundation including an active booking system. Dynamically surfacing those reviews on the site and adding a content section would help that reputation work harder in local search and convert more first-time visitors.
